_header: By a forest as I gan fare
Title(s): The Mourning of the Hunted Hare
_description: The Mourning of the Hunted Hare — 76 lines in quatrains

CULFf548.First Lines:
ffer in frithe as I can fareMy selfe syȝand
                    allone…
CULFf548.Last Lines:
…ffor welle & woo a way it gotheAnd this word hit wendes
                    away
